info.name: Dashboard API Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for E-Commerce Dashboard Backend with all routes and example payloads

body.raw:
{
  "name": "iPhone 15 Pro Max",
  "description": "Latest flagship iPhone with A17 Pro chip",
  "price": 1199,
  "costPrice": 950,
  "categoryId": "{{categoryId}}",
  "sku": "IPH15PM-001",
  "barcode": "9876543210123",
  "stockQuantity": 50,
  "minStockLevel": 10,
  "maxStockLevel": 100,
  "unit": "piece",
  "images": [
    "https://example.com/iphone1.jpg",
    "https://example.com/iphone2.jpg"
  ],
  "status": "active",
  "tags": ["smartphone", "apple", "5g"],
  "attributes": {
    "color": "Natural Titanium",
    "storage": "256GB",
    "connectivity": "5G"
  },
  "weight": 0.221,
  "dimensions": {
    "length": 15.99,
    "width": 7.67,
    "height": 0.83,
    "unit": "cm"
  },
  "supplierId": "{{supplierId}}"
}

{
  "name": "Smartphones",
  "slug": "smartphones",
  "description": "Latest smartphones from top brands",
  "parentId": "{{parentCategoryId}}",
  "image": "https://example.com/smartphones.jpg",
  "icon": "ðŸ“±",
  "status": "active",
  "order": 1,
  "seoTitle": "Best Smartphones 2024",
  "seoDescription": "Shop the latest smartphones with best prices",
  "seoKeywords": ["smartphones", "mobile", "phones"]
}

{
  "name": "Tech Supplies Inc.",
  "email": "contact@techsupplies.com",
  "phone": "+1234567890",
  "company": "Tech Supplies Corporation",
  "address": {
    "street": "456 Business Ave",
    "city": "San Francisco",
    "state": "CA",
    "country": "USA",
    "zipCode": "94105"
  },
  "taxId": "TAX-12345",
  "website": "https://techsupplies.com",
  "status": "active",
  "notes": "Main electronics supplier"
}

{
  "recipientId": "{{userId}}",
  "title": "Special Offer",
  "message": "50% off on all electronics this weekend!",
  "type": "info",
  "priority": "medium",
  "actionUrl": "/promotions/weekend-sale",
  "expiresAt": "2024-01-20T23:59:59.000Z"
}
